duties_responsibilities.duty: Integrating state and local tax services with existing clients
Completing tax planning and research tasks
Developing an understanding of state and local tax regulations and accounting pronouncements
Reviewing client’s current tax processes to identify inefficiencies and provide enhancements to improve the clients’ procedures and reduce tax exposure
Working with the client’s information technology personnel to obtain data of historical purchasing and sales to analyze fo

education_certification.credential: Working towards B.A. / B.S. degree or equivalent from accredited university, 90 credit hours completed, Accounting Major, A minimum 3.0 GPA preferred
